name: trapped inside a train (and there's nothing you can do about it)
name_original: trapped inside a train (and there's nothing you can do about it)
description:
------------------------

You're stuck inside a train. There's got to be something you can do to get out, right?

(A short, nonsensical experimental game. Featuring several endings, including a 'true' one, snark, and a train.)

Length: 15-25 minutes.
------------------------

*This game can be played in your browser, or downloaded on your computer. If the game doesn't work on your browser, please try the downloads.*

If you enjoyed the game, consider leaving a donation and checking out my  other projects.
